DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine safety tolerability AV650 healthy subject give single multi-doses fast fed condition .
DOC.brief_title: Study Examine Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics AV650
DOC.criteria: Nonsmoking Body mass index 18.5 29.9 kg/m2 body mass index great 29.9 kg/m2 good excellent body fat percentage Known hypersensitivity lidocaine nonsteroidal antiinflammatory agent ( NSAIDS ) History clinically significant cardiovascular , pulmonary , endocrine , neurological , metabolic , psychiatric disease History HIV Hepatitis B History symptomatic hypotension History mental illness , drug addiction , drug abuse alcoholism History cancer History inflammatory arthritis ( rheumatoid , lupus , psoriatic arthritis ) Current use immunosuppressive therapy ( systemic steroid , cyclosporine ) use nasal topical steroid History gastric duodenal ulcer disease History severe physical injury , direct impact trauma neurological trauma within 6 month Study Day 1 Female subject pregnant nursing Have donate blood within 90 day Study Day 1 Have receive investigational drug within 90 day Screening Require regular use antihistamine , H2 blocker ( cimetidine , ranitidine ) , TCAs SSRIs take medication witin 14 day Study Day 1
